name: The Sanctum of Iloria
description:
The Sanctum of Iloria is a short FPS platformer game with puzzle elements. It challenges both your mind and eye-hand coordination.
The game takes place in a fantasy setting in the innermost parts of the Iloria mountains, where the chosen one - a young priest from the Cyrose people - must face the ordeal of the sanctum to become the new Grand Claric and bring the dormant magic back to life.

It is not easy to prove oneself worthy, and the trials of Iloria are not something that anyone can just run through. They demands patience, and the ability to wait for the exact right moment, along with a willingness not to give up when things go wrong.

Controls

Keybord - Use W, A, S, D to move around, SPACEBAR to jump, C to crouch, L to open the logbook and the MOUSE to aim with your staff.  

Click Tab to pause and open the options bar.

Cyrose Games

The Sanctum of Iloria is made by Cyrose Games - a group of student at the University of Skövde. The game is made in Unity engine based on the FPS Microgame template. We hope the game is challenging, yet fun, and that you enjoy playing it as much as we did creating it.
